about_the_game:
Cosmic Outpost is a turn-based strategy game where you build an outpost on a new planet. As pioneers, you will construct an outpost while defending against enemies. Gather enough materials to build a spaceship to explore new worlds and expand humanity's frontiers!

Turn-based

Gameplay unfolds in turns. Each turn, you'll make strategic decisions to build and upgrade your outpost, manage resources, and defend against enemy attacks. Plan your moves carefully to ensure your survival and success on the new planet.

Defend your outpost

As you gather resources, you'll encounter periodic waves of enemies seeking to challenge your claim to the planet. Defend your outpost by strategically deploying defenses.

Journey to the stars

The ultimate goal: constructing your interstellar spacecraft. Once your vessel is complete and you've amassed sufficient resources, it's time to embark on a journey to new frontiers, leaving behind the conquered planet to seek out new worlds ripe for exploration and colonization.



Prepare to chart your course through the cosmos, balance resource management with tactical combat, and lead humanity's expansion into the stars in Cosmic Outpost. Are you ready to claim your place among the stars?
